features: 2 PACK INSULATED WATER BOTTLE: BJPKPK insulated water bottles with straw lids use double-walled vacuum insulation technology to keep your beverage cold for up to 24 hours, or hot for up to 12 hours, make sure you enjoy your favorite beverages at the most suitable temperature all day.

FULLY EQUIPPED: We have equipped 2 insulated water bottles, 6 lids, 4 straws and 2 straw brush to meet your every need. Straw lids for iced beverages. Spout lids for hot water. Flex removable lids for drinking smoothie or fruit drinks. All the lids are BPA FREE, leak proof, lead proof and convenient to carry.

PREMIUM MATERIALS: BJPKPK metal water bottles made with high-quality 18/8 food-grade stainless steel, ensuring its durability and rust-resistant quality. With a powder coating finish for a secure grip, a wide-mouth opening for easy ice filling and cleaning, this sports water bottle is perfect for office, gym, traveling, hiking and more.

SWEAT-FREE & REUSABLE: Say goodbye to those annoying sweat rings on your desk or in your car, our thermos water bottle is designed to be sweat-free! Get more out of your outdoor adventures with our reusable water bottle that can be refilled multiple times, reducing environmental waste and promoting a sustainable lifestyle.

IDEAL GIFT CHOICE: BJPKPK 2 pack water bottles comes with multiple colors combinations, and various sizes (18oz, 22oz, 27oz, 32oz, 40oz) to choose from according to your need. Whether you're at the office or out and about, this thermos bottle is the perfect accessory to complement any outfit. It is also a great gift for your loved ones to help them keep hydrated and healthier.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: BJPKPK is committed to design and produce high-quality insulated water bottles. We hope to bring fashionable, portable and reusable products to more families and continue to work in this direction.Our 2 Pack insulated water bottles are made of 18/8 Food Grade Stainless Steel, coated with environmental anti-slip powder at the surface, fully resistant to oxidation, rust and flavor transfer, BPA and lead free, a perfect metal water bottle for your daily water intake.Keeping hydrated is essential for our health, this metal water bottle are designed for everyday using at home, in the office, outdoor parties, and other occasions. It's also a great gift choice for your family or friends.

Made of 18/8 Food-grade Stainless Steel, fully resistant to oxidation, rust, and flavor transfer.Double-walled Vacuum Insulation, keep cold for up to 24 hours, or hot for up to 12 hours.BPA Free, lead-free, fully resistant to oxidation, rust, and flavor transfer.Non-sweat design, ensuring that your bag stays dry and comfortable to hold.Multiple Sizes, multiple color combinations, 6 lids( 2 straw lids, 2 spout lids and 2 flex lids).Spout Lid: The spout lid has a small round opening that provides a controlled flow for thirst quenching.Flex Lid: The flex lid is convenient to carry and easily twists off when you need a sip. Straw Lid: The straw lid easily flips up and down to keep you hydrated when you’re on the move.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My coffee stays hot as I travel to work and the ice remains throughout the day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 4-in-1 large 27 oz tumblers
reviews.reviewText: I found the perfect size for my primary or secondary tumbler. I have a tumbler with me at all times, it has coffee in the winter and water in summer. Well sometimes it has a mixed drink as I'm relaxing on the patio. The tumbler I've been using for sometime now is only 20 oz. Don't get me wrong, it works great but is limited in functionality. This two pack of 27 oz tumblers is a great replacement or addition to it. Although I like the smaller size of my 20 oz tumbler, I find so often 20 oz is just not enough. With the BJPKPK I get 7 more ounces. For shorter trips that's enough but for longer trips I'll take my 20 oz and have this 27 oz as a refill unit. Or maybe take both 27 oz units. My reasoning is I still like my 20 oz tumbler because it fits in the cup holder, I don't have oversized cup holders. And I have 27 oz tumblers that are tapered on the bottom, but I feel they are too tall and not comfortable to use. So I like the design of these tumblers because the circumference is wide but still easy to grip and the height is similar to my 20 oz tumbler. The paint on the tumblers feels good and is not slippery when wet. I love the handles and now I have a choice of tops to use for my purpose. 1 top is solid (Flex) to store whatever I want and when needed I can either pour it out or take a drink. The 2nd top is a spout and my favorite to drink from. The spout has a hinged screw cover that takes only a couple of twist to open. The larger hole works great for everything to include iced drinks. Lastly the 3rd lid is the straw lid. It has a mouth spout that flips up when needed and a straw below. The flip motion is smooth and does not leak when closed. In fact none of the lids leaked. Every lid screws on securely and has a handy handle. I've tested with coffee and hours later my coffee was still hot. I've also left ice in the tumbler for over 24 hours and there was still some ice left. I had to do the ice test to compare to my expensive tumbler and I'm pleased these tumblers worked just as well. I really don't see myself using the straw lid, I'm not a straw using guy but the other 2 lids will get tons of use. For those who like the straws, this kit does come with 4 straws and 2 cleaning brushes. These tumblers are a very important addition to my collection and will replace a couple of my older tumblers permanently. I've spent more on 1 tumbler that does half of what these do. Great price for some very nice tumblers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This two tumbler pack has all the features you want.
reviews.reviewText: Since I am very concerned that I stay hydrated, I have for at least 20 years been buying and accumulating water bottles to carry with me to work, use in the car on trips and have around the house, next to my computer and bedside. They all are either 750 ML or one L transparent plastic and start off with a bite valve or similar straw because I like to not have to elevate the liquid; prefer sucking through a straw. And since I use just water and not coffee or tea or any other hot or cold beverage I just rinse them out and refill with water. The water out of my tap is usually room temperature or colder after running a few seconds.The problem has been that due to aging the silicone bite valve becomes loose and leaks air or loses its water seal and begins to leak if I tip it over or just gets lost since it is just held on by friction. And the flexible plastic carrying handle on top breaks so I end up having to replace a lot of parts and make new handles out of webbing and a worm clamp; not a professional look. Furthermore if I wanted to use the water vessel to carry soup or stew I don't have a suitable closure for the top. And the stainless steel vacuum insulated tumblers I have, some from Amazon, are tapered and therefore must be tall to accommodate the 750 ML to 1 L of water I want to carry with me and they don't have a handle and if they have a screw on or press on cap the straw does not seal 100 percent so tends to leak if tipped. And I can wash the bottom in the dishwasher but not the top.Now this tumbler solves all these problems and is dishwasher safe. Each of the two tumblers in this kit came with three different screw on leakproof caps, each with a handle, two straws and a straw cleaning brush. So you get two bottoms, six tops, four straws and two straw cleaning brushes. The inside diameter of the top, 2 inches (5 cm), is the same as my other tumblers. Of the three tops for each tumbler, one is solid and seals perfectly so you could carry soup or stew, the second has a 7/8 inch (22 mm) outside diameter chug type mouthpiece 3/4 inch (19 mm) high to drink out of if you want to invert the tumbler. This mouthpiece, which is smooth on the outside (is threaded on the inside), is tightly sealed by a captive screw cap attached with a hinge; very nice design. The third, Which is the one I use, has a built-in hinged straw mouthpiece with air compensation valve that lowers and seals perfectly with no leaking at all when inverted and shaken. The colors are fully acceptable in professional gatherings.This tumbler fits perfectly in my car's large cupholder, having a uniform cylindrical shape (no taper) with the same 3.5 inch (9 cm) outside diameter as my other 1 L water bottles. And holds 32 ounces (950 ML). The screw caps, besides having strong nonflexible hinged handles also has a nicely textured, easily gripped surface.In conclusion: my new go-to water bottle. Very highly recommend.
